bioconda.name: start-asap
bioconda.summary: Prepare project directory and project sheet for ASA3P

biocontainers.name: start-asap
biocontainers.summary: Prepare the input directory for 'asa3p', creating automatically a _config.xls_ file from the reads provided.\nrequires one or more reference files (.gbk recommended) and a directory with fastq files (.fq or .fastq, gzipped).\nmetadata can be supplied via command line or with a json file.

biotools.summary:
Prepare the input directory for 'ASA3P', creating automatically a _config.xls_ file from the reads provided.
Requires one or more reference files (.gbk recommended) and a directory with FASTQ files (.fq or .fastq, gzipped).
Metadata can be supplied via command line or with a JSON file.

bioschemas.name: start-asap
bioschemas.summary:
Prepare the input directory for 'ASA3P', creating automatically a _config.xls_ file from the reads provided.
Requires one or more reference files (.gbk recommended) and a directory with FASTQ files (.fq or .fastq, gzipped).
Metadata can be supplied via command line or with a JSON file.
